page.title: 16Blandford - The Brewery
page.content: The Brewery started in Blandford St Mary in 1899.It now employs 950 people that is: Hall & Woodhouse(Brewery) 245 Panda Pops(Mineral Drinks)173 Brewery Inns 532 Hall & Woodhouse brew traditional beer and canned beer which is sold in the South & South West.Panda Pops are sold all over the country.The beer is sold mainly through their own public houses.The raw materials of hops & concentrated malt come from Kent and Oxfordshire.The water is from their own wells in the brewery.The brewing is automatically controlled.They used steam power but now it is electricity. Mark's Dad works at the Brewery and they have just been to London on the Brewery outing.{This page was written {by Blandford St.Mary First School {which has 75 children aged 5-9 years.
